item.title: Scandinavias Biggest Rapper – Einár
item.description: Nils Erik Einar Grönberg AKA. Einár was a Swedish rapper. The 19 year old rap sensation was shot to death late Thursday night October 21, 2021. Einàr was the most played artist on Spotify in Sweden 2019. I discovered his music in the early 2019 with the track “Katten i trakten” on repeat. The track was on his debut album Forsta klass that topped the Swedish charts in 2019, without the need of any (major) record labels help.
